### Programming in R
#### Input and Output
Typical print message:
```{r}
x <- 5.8
cat("The result is",x,"N/m.\n")
```
```{r}
x <- readline("Enter x: \n")
x
```
```{r}
x <- as.numeric(x)
x
```

### Conditional Execution
The traditional if... else... syntax in R
```{r}
x <- 6
y <- 0.5
if (x>2 & y<1){
  print(x)
  print(y)
}else{
  cat("Warning, x<=2 or y>-1\n")
}
```
